plot: When a rich man gets rich, his next ambition is to get even richer. A stockbroker named Joseph encounters a knowledgeable beggar who for five consecutive business days gives him sound advice.
title: Monetization
plot_es: When a rich man gets rich, his next ambition is to get even richer. A stockbroker named Joseph encounters a knowledgeable beggar who for five consecutive business days gives him sound advice.
plot_en: When a rich man gets rich, his next ambition is to get even richer. A stockbroker named Joseph encounters a knowledgeable beggar who for five consecutive business days gives him sound advice.
